Text: The Colour and the Shape:  The record is the debut of the Foo Fighters as a group, as the band's previous record, "Foo Fighters" (1995), was primarily recorded by frontman Dave Grohl and friend Barrett Jones as a demo.

Text: The Colour and the Shape:  The band strived to create a full-fledged rock record, although the music press predicted another grunge offshoot.
